name: GCDualSenseAdaptiveTrigger.Mode
desc: The possible modes of an adaptive trigger.

items.name: case feedback
items.desc: Provides feedback when the user depresses the trigger equal to, or greater than, the start position.

items.name: case weapon
items.desc: Provides feedback when the user depresses the trigger between the start and end positions.

items.name: case vibration
items.desc: Vibrates when the user depresses the trigger equal to, or greater than, the start position.
